mapper.select: SELECT CODE_ID AS "code_id" , CODE_NAME AS "code_name" , CODE_CATEGORY AS "code_category" FROM CODE WHERE CODE_CATEGORY IN ('0B')

SELECT MEMBER_ID ,MEMBER_PASSWORD ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,MEMBER_SEX ,MEMBER_COUNTRY ,ROUND(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,MEMBER_BIRTH)/12) + 1 AS "MEMBER_BIRTH" ,MEMBER_INTRODUCTION ,MEMBER_LEVEL ,MEMBER_PROFILE_IMG ,MEMBER_INTEREST1 ,MEMBER_INTEREST2 ,MEMBER_INTEREST3 ,MEMBER_NAME ,MEMBER_WARNING FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_COUNTRY = #{vo.member_country} AND MEMBER_SEX != #{vo.member_sex} AND MEMBER_LEVEL = '2' ORDER BY MEMBER_BIRTH ASC
